ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: MORE then one account?? please explain
ygData.msgSnippet: So within our one account we can create characters that play on other servers? For instance I can take my Cleric (or Warrior) that I play on Ayonae Ro to say
ygData.messageBody:
So within our one account we can create characters
that play on other servers? For instance I can take my
Cleric (or Warrior) that I play on Ayonae Ro to say
Fennin??

Naara, Barb Warrior
Ayonae Ro
